definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: And this, as you know, is what the Oedipus myth designates.
sentences.chinese: 如你们所知，这就是伊底普斯的神话的意涵所在。

sentences.english: "Connotation" is the implied meaning, similar to "implication" and "implicature".
sentences.chinese: “内涵”就是隐含或意涵，相当于“言外之意”。

sentences.english: And that my friends, is the true meaning of Hanukkah.
sentences.chinese: 而我的朋友们，那就是光明节的真正意涵。

sentences.english: This article also discussed the possible implications of these results and its applicability.
sentences.chinese: 本文亦讨论上述结果的可能意涵及其应用性。

sentences.english: In this connection, such ideas as "knowing-doing" and "constancy-expediency" have strong hermeneutical significance.
sentences.chinese: 所以知行与经权便有很强的诠释学意涵。

sentences.english: But, as always with this artist, even the prosaic topic can hold existential implications.
sentences.chinese: 但对这位艺术家，平凡的主题向来都带有存在的意涵。

sentences.english: Describe the Second Industrial Revolution and discuss its implications for the labor force.
sentences.chinese: 试述第二次工业革命，并探讨其对劳动力之意涵。

sentences.english: Also, imagist expression is used to present the connotation of the play.
sentences.chinese: 并利用意象来呈现剧中的意涵。

sentences.english: Secondly, combined with the fairy-tale set, and to analyze the implications of multiple land ethics.
sentences.chinese: 结合其童话集，分析其中土地倫理的多元意涵。

sentences.english: Art has been a product of modernization and modernity.
sentences.chinese: 对于现代主义的意涵，一直以来人们莫衷一是。

definition: variant of 意識形態|意识形态[yi4 shi2 xing2 tai4]
Ma Ying-jeou (1950-), Taiwanese Kuomintang politician, Mayor of Taipei 1998-2006, president of Republic of China 2008-2016
to come up with an idea/generation of ideas/inspiration
